attributes.action: Impose £4 cap on the price of a pint
attributes.additional_details:
In a time of falling income we need to make a stand on issues that effect real people.

One issue the government should fix is the extortionate prices that some places charge just to have a pint of lager or cider. Places like football grounds, music venues, airports, even some bars. We need to stop this practices but allow normal pubs to stay in business.

The government should bring in a law to cap the price of a pint of drink with alcohol content of less than 5.5% to £4. This would be a simple way to help everyone with limited income to still enjoy a drink whereever they go.
